title: My Funny Valentine
description: From bestselling and award-winning author, Lydia Michaels, comes an enemies-to-lovers, second-chance romance about love and redemption that will steal readers’ hearts!One bed. No heat. And her childhood enemy. When Erin heckles comedian Giovanni Mosconi at his final hometown show, he roasts her in front of everyone. She storms out of the bar and straight into a blizzard.Stranded on the side of the road, she’s not thrilled when the man who just humiliated her tries to rescue her. But one wrong turn lands them both snowed in with a grump–no power, no escape, and one very small bed.Scorching tension and brutal banter lead to one unforgettable night that should never be mentioned again. But such off-the-charts chemistry isn’t easily forgotten. An enemies-to-lovers, forced proximity, romance that will heat up any cold heart over the winter holidays!
author: Lydia Michaels
